article_title: Cruz reads bedtime stories to his kids during marathon speech
article_text: - As Sen. Ted Cruz's marathon speech against Obamacare, modeled on an old-fashioned filibuster, goes late into the night, he takes a moment to read his kids some bedtime stories. ()
